sentences.sentence: When next he spoke he was more placatory.
sentences.translation: 当他又开口说话时，语气更具安抚性。

sentences.sentence: He raised a placatory hand. "All right, we'll see what we can do."
sentences.translation: 他举起一只手，安抚地说：“好吧，我们看看能做些什么。”

sentences.sentence: Music must never be comfortable, never become a museum - piece, not placatory.
sentences.translation: 音乐一定是舒适的，她不会是博物馆的藏品。
